name: Ants Skirmish
description:
Control the ant leader and form army of ants to fight and survive from another ants

This game is submission for GMTK Game Jam 2021 (Theme: Joined Together) and this is my first ever Game Jam that I joined and finish the game.

(It's pretty rough but I tried my best)

Game is simple, just control the ant leader and collect friendly ants (blue one) and survive from enemy ants (red one)

If enemy can touch you, you will die instantly and result to game over.

Control

WASD / Arrow keys / Left click: Control leader

R : Restart the game

Esc : Exit
